173778.「クッ……クックック。\n こいつぁ 傑作だ……。: Kkk....kkk. This guy is a masterpiece...

173779.「陽衆に集まるのは 光で真実をゆがめる \n ペテン師ばかりだってなぁ。:
I heard that the only people who gather in the
Yang Clan are crooks who distort the truth
with light.

173780.「アンタ 知らねえだろう。\n 俺は 何百年も昔……:
You don't know. I've been around for hundreds
of years...

173781.「陽衆の人柱にされた 陰衆の成れの果てだ。:
They are the result of the Yang Clan's human
sacrifice.

173782.「俺は 危険な任にまわされ 命を落とした。 \n その時 俺の血を吸った刀に \:
I was put in harm's way and lost my life. The
sword that fed on my blood at that time became
a vengeful spirit...

173783.「陽衆のヤツら 昔から 分家の陰衆には \n よごれ仕事ばかり 押しつけやがって:
The Yang Clan have always forced the Yin Clan,
their offshoot, to do nothing but dirty work.

173785.「なぁ 覚えておきなよ。 \n 陰衆は陽衆によって しいたげられた一族だと。:
Hey, remember this. The Yin Clan is a family
that was tortured by the Yang Clan.

173786.「その恨みは 深い……。 \n 天地の儀によって さらに深まった……。:
The resentment was deep... deepened by the
rites of heaven and earth...

173787.「この恨みは 消えんよ……クックッ。: This grudge will never go away...kook.

173788.「<pc>！ \n そろそろ 終わるかなって思って\n 迎えにきたよ。:
<pc>! I thought it was about time to
get this over with, so I came to pick you up.

173789.「今日も お役目 お疲れさま！\n バッチリ こなしてて さすがだね。:
Good job today, too! You did a great job, as
expected.

173790.「天地の儀は この場所でおこなわれたんだ。\n ……ここに来たら 思いだしちゃっ:
The ceremony of Heaven and Earth took place
here. ...I remembered it when I came here.

173791.「少し長くなるけど 聞いてくれるかな。:
This will be a little long, but I hope you'll
listen.

173792.「天地の儀っていうのはね\n はるか昔 千夜嵐を消し去った 大幻魔\n テンオツ:
The ceremony of heaven and earth is a ritual to summon the great phantasmal demon Tenotsukijin, who long ago obliterated the
storm of a thousand nights.

173793.「かつて 天地雷鳴士が \n 陰と陽に 分かれてなかった時代……:
Once upon a time, when druids were not divided
into yin and yang...

173794.「あたしたちの先祖は 天地の儀をもって \n 天地雷鳴士としてのワザマエを\n:
Our ancestors demonstrated their druidic wiles
in the presence of the king with the rites of
heaven and earth.

173795.「それを 今の世に復興しようと 決めたのは \n あたしとヨイちゃんの お父ちゃ:
It was my and Yoi's fathers who decided to
revive it in this world.

173796.「陽衆のシノノメと 陰衆のオウマ……\n ふたりは 長年のライバル同士。:
Shinonome of the Yang Clan and Ouma of the Yin
Clan...they have been rivals for many years.

173797.「そして 陽衆と陰衆を ひとつにしようと\n 夢に見る 親友同士でもあった。:
They were also best friends who dreamed of
uniting the Yang Clan and the Yin Clan.

173798.「陽衆と陰衆は 歴史の中で \n たくさんのイザコザを 抱えちゃったけど\n そ:
Yang Clan and Yin Clan have had a lot of
trouble in their history, and they're trying
to put a clean slate on it.

173799.「あたしと ヨイちゃんの 仲がよかったのは \n お父ちゃんたちの 影響だったん:
I think the reason why Yoi and I got along so
well was because of your fathers' influence!

173800.「ウチのお父ちゃんは 陰衆を\n 歴史の表舞台に 引きあげようとした……。:
Our father tried to bring the yin people to
the center stage of history...

173801.「天地の儀は そのきっかけ。\n そして 次世代を担う あたしとヨイちゃんが\n:
The Heaven and Earth Ceremony was the catalyst for this. And the next generation, me and Yoi, were chosen to be the central figures in the
ceremony!

173803.「大切な呪文を……かんでしまって…… \n テンオツキジンは 荒ぶる魂を宿した\:
After chewing on a precious spell,
Tenotsukijin was summoned as an evil spirit
with a raging soul.

173804.「悪霊は 大暴れして\n カミハルムイ城中に 災厄を振りまいた。:
The evil spirit went on a rampage, spreading
mischief throughout Kamiharmui Castle.

173805.「お父ちゃんたちが なんとか食い止めて \n 悪霊を 異界へ還してくれたんだけど:
My father and the others managed to stop it
and return the evil spirit to the other world,
but...

173806.「ヨイちゃんのお父さんは\n あたしをかばって 重い呪詛を受けた……。:
Yoi's father put a heavy Curse on me for
covering him...

173807.「そして それがもとで……亡くなっちゃった。: And because of that... he died.

173808.「だから ヨイちゃんが\n あたしを恨むのは 仕方ないんだよね。:
So I can't blame Yoi for holding a grudge
against me.

173809.「おまけに……天地の儀は 陽衆が陰衆を \n はめるための 罠だったんじゃないか:
In addition... it was mistakenly thought that
the Heaven and Earth Ceremony was a trap for
the Yang Clan to trap the Yin Clan.

173810.「陰衆は 陽衆を 深く深く\n 恨むようになったの……。:
The Yin Clan came to deeply, deeply resent the
Yang Clan...

173811.「これが アサヒちゃんの 若かりし日の\n あやまちってヤツ……かな。: I guess this is Asahi's youthful mistake.

173813.「陽衆と陰衆をひとつにする 夢を継ぐのは\n あたしじゃなきゃって 思うの！:
I think I must be the one to carry on the
dream of uniting the Yang Clan and the Yin
Clan!

173814.「ずっと 誰にも話せなかったから\n 聞いてもらえて すこし楽になったよ。:
I couldn't talk to anyone for a long time, so
I feel a little better now that you've
listened to me.

173816.「それじゃあ 陽衆の隠れ家に帰ろっか。\n 今回も いっぱーい お礼を用意したか:
Well then, let's go back to Yang Clan Hideout.
I've prepared a big bounty for you this time
too.

173817.「ねえ <pc>……。 \n どうして 失敗は やり直せないんだろうね？:
Hey <pc>... why can't we just start
over with our mistakes?
